page.title: 05A Bignold Hospital Cleaner
page.content: A hospital cleaner has to do all sorts of jobs such as washing the dishes, washing and polishing corridor floors, polishing desks, washing out sinks and setting the breakfast trolley. It is important that the hospital is kept as clean as possible to stop germs spreading. As the Bignold is an old hospital it is not so easy to clean as more modern buildings. The cleaners uniform is green with white piping round the arms. The cleaners work on different shifts throughout the day so that there is always someone available to do the cleaning jobs. Part time cleaners get ten days holiday per year plus local holidays. When the new Wick hospital opens some cleaners will be transferred there but others will stay at the Bignold as it will probably change to another type of hospital.
